source:
%%sql
-- Build contract_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim (
    ContractID,
    ContractCode,
    Description,
    ContractTypeCode,
    ContractType,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (order by T1.WorkC NULLS FIRST) AS ContractID,
    T1.WorkC as ContractCode, 
    First(T1.Work_Contract) as Description,
    CASE 
        WHEN T1.CT IS NULL
        THEN 'N/A'
        ELSE T1.CT
    END as ContractTypeCode,
    First(T1.Contract_Type) as ContractType,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.WorkC,'.'), IFNULL(First(T1.Work_Contract),'.'), IFNULL(T1.CT,'.'), IFNULL(First(T1.Contract_Type),'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1 
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.WorkC IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.WorkC, T1.CT
